definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Xiao Cai sheds light on the realities of pricing at Guanghua Market.
sentences.chinese: 小蔡一語道破光華商家的訂價策略。

sentences.english: Vendor name on a printed receipt should be in a decodable format.
sentences.chinese: 收據上的商家名稱應該是可解碼的格式。

sentences.english: This is especially so in commercial and entertainment circles, where the sheep has attained a godlike status.
sentences.chinese: 特別是商家和娛樂團體，把“羊”炒得神乎其神。

sentences.english: Clever uses of shopping bags in advertising campaigns by various companies.
sentences.chinese: 許多商家巧妙地利用購物袋來推廣自己的品牌。

sentences.english: Some of the smaller players have already started to be weeded out.
sentences.chinese: 一些規模較小的商家已經開始倒閉。

sentences.english: She makes linen garments and sells them, and supplies the merchants with sashes .
sentences.chinese: 她做細麻布衣裳出賣，又將腰帶賣與商家。

sentences.english: Beware of pendants that sellers claim snatch radiation from the air.
sentences.chinese: 要小心商家推銷可以吸收空氣中輻射的手機飾品。

sentences.english: The merchant readily followed the advice.
sentences.chinese: 商家很蓉楊遵循的意見。

sentences.english: Click on the merchant name, and a new window will open.
sentences.chinese: 點擊商家名稱，新窗口打開。

sentences.english: So far has attracted nearly 30 business knowledge to join Charlie car.
sentences.chinese: 迄今已吸引了近30家知識商家加盟霹靂車。

sentences.english: The previous agreement had set the annual fee for all sellers at 6, 000 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 之前的協議規定所有商家的每年技術維修費爲6千元。
只有商家的優待券是不夠的。

sentences.english: Through le you ring can also communicate with merchants directly.
sentences.chinese: 通過樂友圈還可以與商家直接溝通。

sentences.english: A widely used promotion method by local retailers is therefore to provide interest-free payment by installment.
sentences.chinese: 當地商家促銷手段通常是分期付款，不收利息。

sentences.english: Let customer satisfaction is the business wins successfully subdues the magic weapon.
sentences.chinese: 讓客戶滿意是商家贏得成功的制勝法寶。

sentences.english: Shops doing Business with a small capital can also make great deals.
sentences.chinese: 小本經營的商家，也能做成大生意。

definition: proprietor of a shop or restaurant/landlord/shop
brick and mortar business/physical (rather than online) retail store
